definition: erhua variant of 小攤|小摊[xiao3 tan1]

sentences.english: The snack bars at the night market all have sodium lamps.
sentences.chinese: 小喫攤兒都點着一盞盞鈉燈。

sentences.english: I am at this spot every day.
sentences.chinese: 我天天都在這兒擺攤兒。

sentences.english: Intrendy shop windows, on little stands.
sentences.chinese: 在時髦的商場櫥窗，在小攤兒上，都有。

sentences.english: I had shaved ice at a snack stand.
sentences.chinese: 我在小喫攤兒吃了一杯刨冰。

sentences.english: His parents are fruit peddlers in a farm produce market.
sentences.chinese: 他父母在農貿市場擺攤兒賣水果。

sentences.english: A busy street of food vendors in Beijing, Donghua men.
sentences.chinese: 北京東華門一處主街道上的小喫攤兒。
